initiateRouteTemplateTitleHelp: The name with which you want to identify the object.
initiateRouteTemplateBasePurposeHelp: The objective of the route that is created using this route template: Standard, Approval, or Review.
initiateRouteTemplateCompletionActionHel: On completion of the route, by default, this action is executed.
initiateRouteTemplateStartOnCompletionHe: On completing a route created by the current template, by default, a route is created using the route template that you select. This allows you to create and work on routes in series.
initiateRouteTemplateDemoteOnRejectionHe: Should maturity state of the route content be changed to the earlier maturity state when the approval task associated with the route is rejected?
initiateRouteTemplateScopeHelp: Only the users, and contents within the selected scope has access to the route.
initiateRouteTemplateTaskEditSettingHelp: How do you want to refrain the route owner from editing the task-list available in the route that is created using this template?
initiateRouteTemplateAutoStopOnRejection: Define when to stop the route if one of its associated tasks is rejected and the other tasks are still being worked on.
initiateRouteTemplateRevertUserGroupHelp: If one of the users from a user group accepts the associated task, define the reassignment of that task if the route is restarted or resumed.
initiateRouteTemplateSelectUserHelp: Should the associated tasks be assigned to a specific person from a user group?
initiateRouteTemplateEsignHelp: Is the eSignature authentication mandatory for approving the associated tasks?

collaborativeSpaceInfo: The storage location for the object. Lists the collaborative spaces where you are assigned a responsibility that allows you to create this object type. If the required collaborative space is not listed, contact your administrator.
organizationInfo: Organization that owns the object. Lists the associated organizations you work for, depending on the selected collaborative space.
appliesToPolicyHelp: Policy for which you are creating the rule.
appliesToTypeHelp: Type of content that needs to be governed by the selected policy.
maturityTransitionHelp: Maturity transition for which you are creating the rule. Depending on the policy selected, only the supported maturity transitions are available.
criteriaSelectionHelp:

appliesToAttributeNameHelp: Only the supported attributes are available depending on the type of content selected.
appliesToAttributeValueHelp: Multiple values can be selected for the attributes having range value.
organizationHelp: Organization that owns the object. Lists the associated organizations you work for, depending on the selected collaborative space.
appliesToCollabSpaceHelp: The storage location for the object. Lists the collaborative spaces where you are assigned a responsibility that allows you to create this object type. If the required collaborative space is not listed, contact your administrator.
notifyAdmin: Notification has been sent to the Platform Administrator for releasing the template.

You can fill the Applies To information only for a route template that is stored in a public collaborative space.
